timeline.bodyText: Given that this method is now only called from FieldMapper#createFieldNamesField(), maybe it should be moved to FieldMapper directly?
timeline.author: romseygeek

replies.bodyText: I liked having it here because it feels like a specialty of FieldNamesFieldMapper, and it's natural to test it in FieldNamesFieldMapperTests.
replies.author: jtibshirani
